item.title: Hamcrest contains() is weird
item.description: I have been using Hamcrest in Java for as long as I can remember.

item.title: Why is everything a todo list app?
item.description: I was recently going through some Apollo documentationabout useQuery and I noticed the examples related to fetching and updating pictures of dogs.
